title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.3 - Filing an appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.3 - Filing an appeal

State Regulations

An appeal pursuant to section
113.2
of this Part shall be filed
within 15 days after issuance of the order of the chancellor from which the
appeal is being taken by filing with the secretary of the city board a
statement of appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
